name: Lucy's Dream
description:
Lucy's Dream is a Victorian-style puzzle horror adventure across two interlinked dimensions.

Gameplay revolves around the player switching between two realms with subtle differences in order to solve puzzles while trying to overcome the horrors of the mansion.

The game was made in twelve weeks by a small group of students from Finland.

THE TEAM

  • Vili Saarenpää - Project Manager, Art
  • Miika Haukkala - Game Design Lead, Code
  • Viyada Heiskanen - Game Design, Art
  • Roni Hänninen - Game Design, Code
  • Monica Snäll - Art Lead
  • Noora Sirén - Art
  • Matti Aarnio - Environment Art
  • Nils Lönnqvist - Rigging, Animation
  • Joni Savolainen - Code Lead
  • Saku Rantalainen - Music, Code
  • Joonatan Saarikko - Code
  • Joona Saksola - Sound Effects
